overview:
Co-Founder and CEO of Gamebox. Veteran of military intelligence who served with the United States Air Force. Graduated from the Defense Language Institute with Honors in the Korean Language Studies program, passing the DLPT with a score of 2+/2+/2. Carried a 3.51 GPA in these classes while handling military obligations and earning a Military Outstanding Volunteer Service Medal. He received an Honorable Discharge in July of 2005.

He is currently divorced and in 2011 moved to San Francisco, CA from Greenfield, IN(a suburb of Indianapolis).

He studied vocational computer programming at Walker Career Center during his high school years, exiting the program in May 2000 with honors and a 3.8 GPA. He has used his knowledge of COBOL, C++, HTML, JavaScript, Perl, PHP, and Java in various roles throughout his life. In November 2010, he and a close friend - Jason McDaniel - decided to focus all of their time and attention on a business concept he had devised in 2007. The result of this endeavor is Gamebox, which resides at the intersection of Gaming, Mobile, Social, and E-commerce.

web_presences.title: Inside the Box - A Tumblr Blog
